title: Problems on New client
body: On the new client i cant seem to create a new lobby or join in one  from time to time. Everything else is loading fine like the news and my own fl but its only happening on the lobby creation/joining phase. It says patcher is disconnected even though my patching is complete. And when i hover in the gray play button it tells me im offline  even though my internet is fine. I've provided the Screenshot on the link box above..

replies.body: It's happening to me too. It's very annoying.
Update: Six days later and it still hasn't fixed itself. I might need some actual help.

It sounds like League needs to grab some updates and you on the same version as everyone else, so you won't be able to select Play until that happens.  A relog should help force a patch along.  If you run into any trouble, run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure nothing is blocking your network from specifically reaching the patching server.  Let me know if you have any questions!
